publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Entries from the Cherokee Supreme Court Docket, 1823-1834, New Echota] 1826 Oct. 31
bibl.note: This is an excerpt from the Cherokee Supreme Court docket for the years 1823 to 1834. The Cherokee Supreme Court convened annually in New Echota beginning on the second Monday in October and lasting three weeks. This excerpt is from the Tuesday October 31, 1826 session of court. Entries from this Supreme Court docket cover items ch100-ch163.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.head: October & November Term 1826 The court adjourned untill until tomorrow.
Tuesday 31st Oct. October
div.p:
The court met according to adjournment Present their Honors, John Martyn Martin
, James Daniel,
Jas. James Brown, Walter S. Adair.
The court find for the plaintiff forty five dollars & seventy five cents & cost of suit Cost of appeal $2.75 cts cents

Arch. Fields
vs.
W. William Williams & Jane Williams
The court fined for the defendants-

Witness. Henry Freshower 7 days-- $5.25
Anny Wolf 7 do ditto --5.25
Ben Curry10 do---12.00
The Court adjourned until tomorrow 10. o,clock. Execution issued 6th Nov. November 1826
